It happens sometimes. You just got to wait a while and try again. Or switch to wechat pay.
U need to transfer in 2k

Chinese transactions are marked by banks as suspicious. When the ending merchant like didi or major brands restaurants charge  mostly will go through. But because each Alipay wallet can be linked to some weird entity the banks block it. For eg. every time I go China I have to message trust bank support to white list my transactions for the period travelled.Still sometimes it gets blocked  most of the time Alipay ones work more than WeChat ones though
It happened to me Shanghai. Had to message trust support to unlock my card. To give credit  they responded promptly.
Shanghai story seems familiar. There was one time in Shanghai ‚Ä¶.
I suggest to have WeChat pay and Alipay setup. Each app have 2 credit cards linked. You don‚Äôt really need to use cash. In fact  the locals will find it strange if you use cash
Ok  I had just received too. Thanks
But if you rotate the funds between 2 accounts  then how will the giro work? There won't be any funds for giro deduction for the other bank's credit card bills  tax  etc.
Just 1 main for giro purpose  one for incremental interest
You just basically have to pay the account for the giro bills.
I am just not sure whether rotate per 2 month better or per month works better
Oh I see. So just maintain 2k
